name: Chaosteroids
description:
I wasn't originally going to join the jam, after just coming out of another chaotic jam where I was much too ambitious, but after seeing the theme, I decided rather than stretch myself to breaking, I'd build something well and well within my means. Gameplay = chaotic, Dev = not!

Credits

Font - EastSeaDokdo (https://fonts.google.com/specimen/East+Sea+Dokdo)

Music note icons - https://www.kenney.nl/assets/game-icons

SFX - https://www.kenney.nl/assets/sci-fi-sounds
